code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=()=>{const[product,setProducts]=useState([]);const MAX_WORDS_TO_DISPLAY=15;useEffect(()=>{setProduct();},[]);const setProduct=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5050/user/getProduct");setProducts(res.data);};const truncateDescription=text=>{const words=text.split(' ');if(words.length<=MAX_WORDS_TO_DISPLAY){return text;}return"".concat(words.slice(0,MAX_WORDS_TO_DISPLAY).join(' '),"...");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-sm p-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row ",children:product&&product.map((value,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-4 py-2 product",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card px-5 pb-2 pt-5 d-felx  text-center",style:{height:500},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[value.title,"  "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-secondary",children:truncateDescription(value.description)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",style:{height:320},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:value.image,alt:"",className:" ",loading:"lazy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row-sm d-flex py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6 px-2 text-start",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"pi pi-indian-rupee text-primary",children:value.price})," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6 px-2 text-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn border rounded-5 border-2 border-black hoverbtn",children:"Add to cart"})})]})]})},index))})})});};export default Product;
